title: How many Supreme Court cases have there been? - Quora
tags: History of the United States of America
Legal Issues and Law in Everyday Life

response.answer_text: The Court literally gets thousands of requests to hear cases every year but because of time and/or legal interpretation, the Court only hears a little more than one hundred a year. They don’t want to decide all issues.

It has 66000 cases pending . Judges are only 28. If they sit in double bench and more courts are drastically reducedSupreme court is burdened with political and corrupt babus cases. They try their best.
